title: How to Make Lemon Ginger Syrup

steps.headline: Add 2 glasses of water in 1.25 kilogram sugar.
Cook the mixture of water and sugar for 10 minutes.
Try to make the mixture like syrup.
Keep the syrup in cool and dry place.
Try to grate the ginger pieces and make ginger paste.
Add ginger paste in the syrup of sugar and water.
keep it in cool place for 5 minutes.
Add the pure and fresh juice of 15 lemons.
Store the syrup in bottles and keep in the fridge for half hour.
Take 1 glass of water and add 2 spoons of syrup with a little salt and ice cubes.

text: Add 2 glasses of water in 1.25 kilogram sugar.  Cook the mixture of water and sugar for 10 minutes.  Dissolve the sugar completely.  Try to make the mixture like syrup.  Keep the syrup in cool and dry place.  Take 80 grams of ginger.  Peel the ginger completely.  Try to grate the ginger pieces and make ginger paste.  Add ginger paste in the syrup of sugar and water.  Cook it for 10 minutes again.  keep it in cool place for 5 minutes.  Add the pure and fresh juice of 15 lemons.  Store the syrup in bottles and keep in the fridge for half hour.  Take 1 glass of water and add 2 spoons of syrup with a little salt and ice cubes.  Lemon-ginger syrup is ready now.
